name: AdWise Group
description:
AdWise Group is a successful full-service Dallas advertising agency – that’s been around since 1984. Successful by serving businesses that need exactly what we offer:  insightful client service, incisive media strategies and inspired, persuasive creative solutions.
We help focus your marketing strategies into vivid, memorable messages that are delivered in the most efficient media mix targeted to your specific audience. We creatively shape your message to be tailored to the specific needs of each media and then deliver that message using an integrated, cross–platform media mix. We rely on data, market research and decades of experience to select the best media for the situation, which may include social media, print, broadcast, mobile marketing, outdoor, Internet marketing and more.
